name: PRpal
description: PRpal is a tool that enforces peer review by requiring the assignee of your pull request to give a +1.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: Create a GitHub application and fill this in

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Create a GitHub application and fill this in

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Secret key for GitHub webhook verification

WEBHOOK_URL.description: URL for receiving webhook notifications; should be the app's URL + /payloads/github

LOGENTRIES_TOKEN.description: LogEntries token for forwarding production logs
